channel.title: Naturalism on Bible Research
channel.description: Recent content in Naturalism on Bible Research

item.title: What Is a Human Being?
item.description: “Let Us make man in Our image, according to Our likeness; and let them rule over the fish of the sea and over the birds of the sky and over the cattle and over all the earth, and over every creeping thing that creeps on the earth. God created man in His own image, in the image of God He created him; male and female He created them."1 “What is man that You magnify him, and the You set Your heart on him…"2 “To properly understand man, one must do so from a God-centered perspective.
